languages.text: "Этого я не утверждал". {n}Лицо арбитра непроницаемо, но кажется, что в глубине взгляда играет огонек.{/n}
"I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Этого я не утверждал". {n}Лицо арбитра непроницаемо, но кажется, что в глубине взгляда играет огонек.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

languages.text: « Je n'ai rien insinué de la sorte. » {n}L'expression de l'arbitrator est impénétrable, mais vous pensez déceler une petite étincelle dans les profondeurs de son regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai rien insinué de la sorte. » {n}L'expression de l'arbitrator est impénétrable, mais vous pensez déceler une petite étincelle dans les profondeurs de son regard.{/n}

languages.text: 「そんなことは一言も言っていません」{n}アービトレイターの表情は読み取れないが、その眼差しの奥にはかすかな光がきらめいているように見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことは一言も言っていません」{n}アービトレイターの表情は読み取れないが、その眼差しの奥にはかすかな光がきらめいているように見えた。{/n}

languages.text: «Yo no he afirmado nada por el estilo». {n}La expresión del Arbitrator es inescrutable, pero hay una leve chispa en lo más profundo de su mirada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Yo no he afirmado nada por el estilo». {n}La expresión del Arbitrator es inescrutable, pero hay una leve chispa en lo más profundo de su mirada.{/n}

languages.text: “这种话我可没说过。”{n}尽管索罗蒙脸上没有任何表情，但他目光深处似乎有火花在闪烁。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这种话我可没说过。”{n}尽管索罗蒙脸上没有任何表情，但他目光深处似乎有火花在闪烁。{/n}

languages.text: "Öyle bir şey demedim." {n}Yargıcı'nın mizacını anlamak epey zor olsa da bakışlarının derinliklerinde bir kıvılcım geziniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyle bir şey demedim." {n}Yargıcı'nın mizacını anlamak çok zor olsa da bakışlarının derinliklerinde bir kıvılcım geziniyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Das habe ich nicht behauptet." {n}Die Miene des Arbitrators ist undurchdringlich, aber in den Tiefen seiner Augen scheint sich ein Funke zu regen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I made no such claim." {n}The Arbitrator's expression is impenetrable, but there seems to be a spark glinting in the depths of his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das habe ich nicht behauptet." {n}Die Miene des Arbitrators ist undurchdringlich, aber in den Tiefen seiner Augen scheint sich ein Funke zu regen.{/n}
